text:
In a stunning reversal, The New York Times said a controversial op-ed from Republican Sen. Tom Cotton did not meet its standards.

The statement came only hours after the newspaper's editorial page editor defended publishing it amid outrage from staff. https://t.co/cdjioEYU8V
